attributes.action: Clean the wye river and fine all people responsible for polluting the river
attributes.background: Clean the wye and Monnow river so people can use the rivers in the summer

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about managing pollution in the River Wye are a matter for the relevant local authorities and environmental agencies, not the Government or House of Commons. As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.
